fire.title: Fire
fire.description: Passion, destruction, purification, and transformation. Fire consumes and renews, destroys and illuminates. The sacred flame of sacrifice, the forge of creation, the fury of divine wrath.

earth.title: Earth
earth.description: Stability, fertility, grounding, and endurance. The solid foundation of existence, the nurturing womb of life, the patient strength of stone and soil. Mother of all that grows.

water.title: Water
water.description: Flow, emotion, life, and purification. The primordial ocean from which all emerged, the cleansing rain, the tears of gods. Adaptable, formless, essential to all existence.

air.title: Air
air.description: Intellect, freedom, communication, and breath. The invisible force that carries words and spirits, the wind of change, the breath of life itself. Mind over matter.

chaos_void.title: Chaos / Void
chaos_void.description: The primordial formlessness before creation, the endless potential of the abyss. Not absence but infinite possibility. The dark womb from which order emerges and to which it returns.

divine_light.title: Divine Light
divine_light.description: Order, consciousness, creation, and revelation. The first light breaking the darkness, the illuminating power of awareness, the golden radiance of divine presence and cosmic law.

related_content.title: Related Content
points: Agni - Hindu god of sacred fire
